body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Blue Wheels Customer Service. My name is Roy King. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Victoria. Could you please provide me with your contact number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I also have your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's v garcia at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Victoria. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the recent service I received at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Victoria. Let's work together to resolve this matter. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Victoria. Have a great day.
